snippet.title: Sega Genesis Gold Edition Collection Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.GameZone.com

Ok, so this trailer is from the UK and makes mention of some strange beast called the 'Mega Drive.' But we all know the score, this is a collection of the best Sega Genesis games ever seen. Genesis, the beginning of all things. Taking it back to the old school you'll get an incredible forty-six titles in this one, spanning a variety of different genres. Granted for every winner (Gunstar Heroes, Streets of Rage) there's the occasional loser (Virtua Fighter 2, Toejam & Earl 2) though this still looks like an awesome deal.
